name: Twerk Meter
description:
So you think you can twerk, huh?

Put your skills to the test with Twerk Meter! Are you a superhuman #twerkmonster or a #twerkfail? Play our game to find out!

• Challenge a friend to a Twerk Off!
• See how long you can last as you twerk to the left, twerk to the right, and thrust your way to twerkmastery!
• See how fast you can twerk with Speed Challenge!
• Compete with people across the globe through leaderboards!
• Get achievements for your twerking skills!
• Free to play!
